Por Capital

  • {{ country.ca }} - {{ country.population }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CountriesService } from '../../services/countries.service'; import { Country } from '../../interfaces/country'; @Component({ selector: 'app-by-capital-page', templateUrl: './by-capital-page.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class ByCapitalPageComponent { public countries: Country[] = []; constructor( private countriesService: CountriesService ){} searchByCapital( term: string ):void { this.countriesService.busquedaDeCapital( term ) .subscribe( countries => {this.countries = countries;} ); } }
